```{r}
Home_Range <- log(d$HomeRange_km2)
Brain_Size_Female_Mean <- log(d$Brain_Size_Female_Mean)
```
```{r}
c <- cbind(d, Home_Range, Brain_Size_Female_Mean)


l <- lmodel2(Home_Range~Brain_Size_Female_Mean, data= c  , range.y ="Interval" , range.x="Relative"  , nperm=0)

mx <- l$regression.results$slope


b <-l$regression.results$Intercept
```
